summary: A mad scientist transforms himself into an aquatic killer.
cast: Marshall Grauer|Wade Popwell|Paul Galloway|Gerald Cruse|Sanna Ringhaver|Dave Dickerson|Rich Valliere|Nancy Lien|Russell Holcomb|Gloria Brady|Del Galloway|Hal Nearhoof|Jim Merrill|Elizabeth Barton|Bob Knowles|Carol Thompson|Jack Weatherford|Doug Thomas|Frank Crowell
title: Zaat
